title: 2025 Programming Project Ideas for Skill-Building and AI Mastery
description: This article explores 2025 programming project ideas from sources like Codecrafters, emphasizing skill-building through AI integrations, open-source tools, mobile/web apps, automation, and advanced prototypes. These hands-on challenges mimic real-world problems, boost portfolios, and prepare developers for career growth in a competitive tech landscape.

title: Meta buys Manus to scale AI agents across its platform
description: CNBC’s MacKenzie Sigalos reports on Meta’s push to show an AI payoff beyond ad targeting, as it adds a fast-growing subscription agents business and faces rising scrutiny over its spending.

title: Data centers turn to jet engine turbines to power AI workloads
description: Facing multi-year waits for electrical grid connections, data center operators supporting artificial intelligence (AI) workloads are turning to an unexpected supplier: supersonic jet engine manufacturer Boom Supersonic. The Colorado-based company, backed by OpenAI CEO Sam Altman, recently secured an order to deliver 1.2GW of power generation capacity to data center operator Crusoe, pivoting part of its aerospace technology to the energy sector.

title: Meta buys Singapore startup Manus in latest move to advance its artificial intelligence efforts
description: Meta reportedly closed the deal at more than $2 billion.
